title: aligned-textgrid: - Lightweight access to structured phonetic data
text:
SCiL 2024









References

Boersma, Paul, and David Weenink. 2024. “Praat: Doing Phonetics by Computer (Version 5.0.35) [Computer Program] Version 6.4.04.” http://www.praat.org/.


Gorman, Kyle. 2019. TextGrid: Praat TextGrid Manipulation.


Mahrt, Tim. 2023. Praatio: A Library for Working with Praat, Textgrids, Time Aligned Audio Transcripts, and Audio Files. https://github.com/timmahrt/praatIO.


McAuliffe, Michael, Elias Stengel-Eskin, Michaela Socolof, and Morgan Sonderegger. 2017. “Interspeech 2017.” In, 3887–91. ISCA. https://doi.org/10.21437/Interspeech.2017-1390.


Rosenfelder, Ingrid, Josef Fruehwald, Keelan Evanini, Scott Seyfarth, Christian Brickhouse, Kyle Gorman, Hillary Prichard, and Jiahong Yuan. 2024. FAVE: Forced Alignment and Vowel Extraction. [object Object]. https://doi.org/10.5281/ZENODO.593309.
